title: Extensis Universal Type Server
content:
Hello, I am wondering if anyone has used or is using this new Universal Type Server by Extensis. My creative department has been using LinoType Font ExplorerX for some time now and it isn’t bad, but I feel we should be on a server based system so we can track usage and purchases and what fonts we actually own and which ones are download by some HACKS! hahahaha!

Any feedback would be greatly appreciated. If anyone is in the Boston/NYC area I would love to check it out in action too!

Thanks

comments.content:
Hi Mario,

If you’d like to test out Universal Type Server, it’s available as a free fully-functional trial demo that works for 30 days from the Extensis website - typserver.com.

If you’d rather not install your own server, you might find some of our demo videos helpful in evaluating Type Server: [http://blog.extensis.com/?p=1548](http://web.archive.org/web/20081121182306/http:/blog.extensis.com/?p=1548 "http://blog.extensis.com/?p=1548")

Feel free to PM me with any questions.

Jim Kidwell
